messages.subject: Mind-changing (was Re: computer for almost 5 year old
messages.msgSnippet: -=-I find it funny that I can contribute to a thread like this since when my oldest was born I was not going to allow electronics. What a difference.-=- I find
messages.messageBody:
-=-I find it funny that I can contribute to a thread like this since when my oldest was born I was not going to allow electronics. What a difference.-=-

I find it beautiful that you find it funny. Ironic.
Seeing progress revealed by relief, satisfaction and surprise is very cool.

Ren Allen, when she first came around unschooling, was anti-television and argued forcefully. She wanted those arguments saved and available so people could see that she changed her mind.
http://sandradodd.com/t/debate

And there are stories of mind-changing here, too.
http://sandradodd.com/gettingit

This is what it's all about, learning and growing--seeing the growth.

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
